name: ZombieZone
description:
Next update: 1/28

ZombieZone is a game were you are a guy named Axel and you are in a arena/dungeon. And you need to fight your way out against zombies, it is getting harder the longer you live.

ZombieZone is our first game, and we will be happy if you try it. It is completely free. if you wont to now more about it http://danoroomdk.wixsite.com/danoroom
